name: Trips
description: For some of my longer trips I've collected posts into easily browsable trip pages. The trip pages include posts on planning the trips, trip reports, and other observations.

subCategories.name: Tahoe Rim Trail 2018
subCategories.description: In July - August 2018, I hiked the The Tahoe Rim Trail (TRT). It is a 165 mile trail around Lake Tahoe in California and Nevada. It was my first through-hike.
